roleset.name: spray with mace (or similar)

example.name: standard from BOLT
example.text: I was in the room off the main hallway getting signed into the meeting when someone shouts out from the hallway " Security ! Security ! They 're pepperspraying us ! "

example.name: All args
example.text: Someone came at me with a knife, and I screamed and I peppersprayed him with the stuff you gave me.
example.arg: with the stuff you gave me

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls butter-9.9.
